snippet.title: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - West Balkans Exclusive Gameplay
snippet.description:
Sit back, relax, and be our co-driver on an exclusive drive through the upcoming West Balkans DLC.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2004210/Euro_Truck_Simulator_2__West_Balkans/

Please keep in mind, that everything in this video is still very much "Work in Progress" stage and that everything you see might be changed before the actual release of this expansion

If you like what you see the best way to support our teams is to add this upcoming DLC to your Steam wishlist!
